keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Attempts to Recruit Ace
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard tries to recruit Ace into his crew, revealing his ambition to rule the world.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Blackbeard's growing ambition and his belief that he can challenge the old order.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates Battle Ace
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates engage Portgas D. Ace in the Duel on Banaro Island.
keyMoments.significance: This battle will lead to Ace's capture and trigger the Summit War of Marineford.

formerMembers.reason: Betrayed the crew by murdering Thatch and stealing the Yami Yami no Mi

keyMoments.title: Thatch's Murder Revealed
keyMoments.description: It is revealed that Blackbeard murdered 4th Division Commander Thatch to steal the Yami Yami no Mi, violating the crew's code.
keyMoments.significance: This betrayal sets in motion the events that will lead to the Summit War of Marineford.

keyMoments.title: Ace's Loyalty to Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: Ace declares his unwavering loyalty to Whitebeard, refusing to join Blackbeard even when facing death.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strong bonds within the Whitebeard Pirates and Ace's devotion to his captain.

jollyRoger: Skull with white mustache and crossbones
